mapper.select: select m.perms from t_admin_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_admin_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_admin_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct rm.menu_id from t_admin_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_admin_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select u.id, u.real_name, u.number,o.name from t_admin_user u,t_organization o
(u.real_name like concat ("%",#{condition},"%") or u.number like concat ("%",#{condition},"%") or o.name like concat("%",#{condition},"%"))
and u.org_id = o.id and u.community_id = #{communityId} and o.is_repair = 1
